products.name: SleepWell Basic
warnings: Consult physician if pregnant or nursing.
May cause drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery after taking.

reviews.text: Simple and effective. I take it maybe 2-3 times a week when I can't fall asleep. Works within 30 minutes, no grogginess.
Best value on the market. Same melatonin as the expensive brands. Been using for 6 months with no issues.
Does what it says. Nothing fancy but I fall asleep faster on nights I take it.
Good starter option. Tried this before looking at more complex formulas but honestly this works fine.
Works okay but I was hoping for something stronger for my chronic insomnia. Might need to try something else.

products.name: NightRest Plus
products.directions: Take 2 capsules 45 minutes before bedtime with water.
warnings: Consult physician if pregnant, nursing, or taking any medications.
May cause drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery.
Valerian may interact with sedatives, anti-anxiety medications, and alcohol.

reviews.text: The valerian really helps quiet my racing mind. I have anxiety and this combo works better than melatonin alone for me.
Good product but I feel a bit groggy in the morning. Taking only 1 capsule instead of 2 now.
Works but gave me really weird dreams. Also felt hungover the next morning. Went back to basic melatonin.
Perfect for stressful periods. I use this when work is crazy and my mind won't shut off.
Too strong for me. I only have occasional trouble sleeping and this knocked me out but I felt terrible the next day.

products.name: DreamCore Premium
products.directions: Take 2 capsules 1 hour before bedtime with water. Start with 1 capsule to assess tolerance.
warnings: Consult physician before use, especially if you have any medical conditions.
Do not use if pregnant, nursing, or under 18 years of age.
May cause significant drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery.
Do not combine with alcohol or sedative medications.
5-HTP should not be taken with SSRIs, SNRIs, MAOIs, or other serotonergic medications due to risk of serotonin syndrome.
GABA may interact with blood pressure medications.
Discontinue use and consult physician if you experience headaches, nausea, or mood changes.
Not intended for daily long-term use without physician supervision.

reviews.text: I have severe chronic insomnia and have tried everything. This is the only thing that works for me. Yes it's expensive but I finally sleep.
Way too strong. I just have occasional trouble falling asleep and this was complete overkill. Felt drugged the next day. Returned it.
Very effective but the side effects are real. Vivid dreams, morning grogginess, occasional headache. I only use it when desperate.
Had a bad reaction - felt dizzy and nauseous. I think this has too many ingredients. Simpler is better for most people.
Finally something that works for my chronic insomnia. Been struggling for years. Worth every penny for people with serious sleep issues.
It works but I'm concerned about the 5-HTP long term. My doctor said I shouldn't take this regularly. Good for occasional severe nights only.
Bought this thinking more ingredients = better. Wrong. Just needed basic melatonin. Don't waste your money unless you have chronic issues.

products.name: Calm Gummies
warnings: Consult physician if pregnant or nursing.

reviews.text: These taste amazing and actually work! I hate swallowing pills so these are perfect.
Best sleep gummies I've tried. Gentle, effective, great taste. Perfect for occasional sleepless nights.
Good product but I wish they weren't so sugary. Work well though.
My go-to for travel. Easy to pack, no water needed, and they work.
Taste great but the lower melatonin dose (2.5mg vs 3mg) doesn't seem as effective for me.

products.name: Melatonin Fast Dissolve
products.directions: Place 1 tablet on tongue and allow to dissolve. Take 30 minutes before bedtime.
warnings: Consult physician if pregnant or nursing.

reviews.text: Best deal on melatonin. 90 tablets for $9 and they work great. No reason to pay more.
Love the fast dissolve format. Keep them on my nightstand. No fumbling for water in the dark.
Simple, effective, cheap. What more do you need for occasional sleeplessness?
Pleasant mint taste and dissolves quickly. Good value product.
Works fine but tablets are a bit chalky. Still, can't beat the price.
